phq9_question_1.name: Little interest or pleasure in doing things

phq9_question_3.name: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much

phq9_question_4.name: Feeling tired or having little energy

phq9_question_6.name: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

phq9_question_7.name: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

phq9_question_8.name: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

phq9_question_9.name: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

phq9_difficulty.name: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
